Content.Text:
<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hello <MYNAME>.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How is farm life treating you? Please, don't
hesitate to tell me if you have any questions or
concerns.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKNOWN>Heeeey, I'm hooome!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well, well! Welcome home. I feel like I haven't
seen you in ages.
<PAGE>
Did you enjoy your trip?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<NAME_UNKNOWN>Totally! I went to the most AMAZING place.
There were animals everywhere. It was like
frolicking in a dream!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Really? I look forward to hearing all about it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Oh, yes. This is the first time you two have met,
isn't it?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKNOWN>Oh, hi! And who's this now?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is <MYNAME>, the new farmer I mentioned
in my last letter.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh! So you're <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
It's nice to finally meet you! My name is <BLUE>Agate</BLUE>.
I'm a ranger! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
What's a ranger? Well, that's my job!
<PAGE>
It's an awesome career 'cause I get to spend all
day outside with the animals.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
As you can see, Agate has quite the love of
wildlife. As a ranger, she works to protect and
conserve the plants and animals found in nature.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Exactly!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, now that Agate has finally come home...
<PAGE>
The <BLUE>Wild Safari</BLUE> should be open for use again,
soon. Agate, do you think you're up to resuming
your position as Safari Guide?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Absolutely! Just leave it to me! ♪
<PAGE>
The Safari goes through a place where a whole
lot of wild animals live.
<PAGE>
If you put in a request for a visit at the guild, I'll
take you there for a tour.
<PAGE>
Oh! And don't forget, you can take your farm
animals there, too.
<PAGE>
They'll be able to have a quiet and carefree time
there, so it'd be like a vacation for them!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sure Agate would like to inspect it after her
long absence. Why don't you go with her for a
visit?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That'd be great! C'mon, I'll explain all about it
once we get there.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Aaaand here we are! ♪

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Isn't it the most amazing place? Everywhere you
look, you can see nature in its pristine state. All
the animals here love it.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks! As the ranger in charge here, I'm glad
you like it.
<PAGE>
Now, let me explain a little more about the Wild
Safari.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If there's anything you didn't catch the first time,
check your bookshelf. I'll put some useful books
there.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay. Let's head on home, then.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome back, both of you.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good to be back!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
How did you like it? It's a wonderful place, don't
you think?
<PAGE>
If you'd like to visit the Safari, come speak with
me to arrange a visit.
<PAGE>
Though, if you have a horse, you can go directly
there from any Riding Station.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm going to head home, then. I look forward to
seeing you again soon, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This is White Clover Field. If you bring any of
your farm animals to the Safari grounds through
the guild, this is where they go.
<PAGE>
All of the animals really love it here. If they're
stressed out, it really helps them relax and
unwind.
<PAGE>
They don't even mind if it rains while they're
here.
<PAGE>
If you bring them to visit a lot of times, you
never know what kinds of cool things might
happen.
<BLUE>Using the Safari</BLUE> was added to your bookshelf.
<BLUE>Mining</BLUE> was added to your bookshelf.
